Method Detail

discoverGenericType

public static java.lang.Class<?> discoverGenericType(java.lang.Iterable<?> iterable)

asIterator

public static java.util.Iterator<?> asIterator(java.lang.Object object)
Tries to convert a generic object in an Iterator. This method works with Iterators, Arrays, Iterables and Maps and in this last case an Iterator over the Map's values is returned. If the object is null returns an Iterator over an empty collection. If none of the above applies throws an IllegalArgumentException.

Parameters:
object - The object to be converted
Returns:
The Iterator resulting from the object conversion
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given object is neither an Iterator, Array, Iterable or Map.

asResettableIterator

public static ResettableIterator<?> asResettableIterator(java.lang.Object object)

flattenIterator

public static <T> java.util.List<T> flattenIterator(java.lang.Object iterable)
Flattens the given iterable by recursively descending through its nested Collections and create a flat List of all of the leaves. This method also works with Maps (by collecting their values) and arrays.

Parameters:
iterable - The iterable to be flattened
Returns:
The flattened iterable
